title: Navaratna Vaagai Ungarala: The Auspicious Gemstone Ring
features: A traditional Navaratna ring featuring nine auspicious gemstones arranged in a floral pattern, surrounded by glittering cubic zirconia. Handcrafted with fine milgrain detailing around each gemstone setting. This 'vaagai' (design) represents prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: Ideal for auspicious occasions like weddings (Vaddanam)
and festivals like Ugadi and Sankranthi. Also
perfect as a meaningful gift or a statement piece for daily wear.
description: This Navaratna ring is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and detail. The nine gemstones are believed to bring balance, harmony, and good luck to the wearer. A true heirloom piece that embodies tradition and elegance. The inclusion of Cubic Zirconia enhances the sparkle and brilliance of the ring while keeping it accessible.
